mapper.sql: select t.id, t.code, t.name, t.remark, t.is_enable, t.is_system, t.is_delete, createUser.id, createUser.name, t.create_time, lastUpdateUser.id, lastUpdateUser.name, t.last_update_time, deleteUser.id, deleteUser.name, t.delete_time from system_dictionary t left join system_user createUser on t.create_user_id = createUser.id left join system_user lastUpdateUser on t.last_update_user_id = lastUpdateUser.id left join system_user deleteUser on t.delete_user_id = deleteUser.id
mapper.insert: insert into t_dictionary(id, code, name, remark, create_user_id, create_time) values (#{id}, #{code}, #{name}, #{remark}.#{createUser.id}, #{createTime})
